definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Eg. For the second time in her life she made an indirect answer.
sentences.chinese: 這是她有生以來第二次說話躲躲閃閃。

sentences.english: There was nothing to do but admit that I began menstruating or the very first time in my life.
sentences.chinese: 沒辦法，我只好告訴他有生以來我第一次來月經了。

sentences.english: She had hardly ever been in a state so nearly approaching high spirts in her life.
sentences.chinese: 她有生以來還很少這樣接近過欣喜如狂的程度。

sentences.english: I believe that was the first time in my life I was angered by economic injustice.
sentences.chinese: 我相信那是我有生以來首次被如此的經濟不公所激怒。

sentences.english: This is the first time in my life that I've experienced the masses voting on rewards for cadres.
sentences.chinese: 羣衆投票給幹部發獎，這是我有生以來經歷的第一次。

sentences.english: I’m free for the first time in my life.
sentences.chinese: 有生以來我第一次感到如此自由自在。

sentences.english: He said she was the best bluffer he'd ever seen .
sentences.chinese: 父親說母親是他有生以來見到的出牌高手。

sentences.english: Sara had spent most of her young life in the hospital unit at the training school.
sentences.chinese: 薩拉有生以來的大部份時間都在這所衛生院度過。

sentences.english: For the second time in her life she made an indirect answer.
sentences.chinese: 這是她有生以來第二次說話躲躲閃閃。

sentences.english: Then she writes, "This is the best month of my life.
sentences.chinese: 她又寫道，“這是我有生以來最美好的一個月。

sentences.english: It was the 1st time in my life to be in Huhehaote.
sentences.chinese: 我是有生以來第一次來到呼市。

sentences.english: For the first time in my life, I felt whole.
sentences.chinese: 有生以來第一次，我感到了自己是一個整體。

sentences.english: It was in fact the first time in his life that he had looked at any woman.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，這是他有生以來頭一次盯着看女人。
